dcterms:creator: F. J. Cao
L. Dinis
J. M. R. Parrondo
dcterms:description: A dataset that describes the feedback control mechanisms in a collective flashing ratchet, which is a model that transports Brownian particles using a spatially periodic, asymmetric, and time-dependent on-off switchable potential.
dcterms:title: Collective Flashing Ratchet Model

dcterms:creator: M. B. Tarlie
R. D. Astumian
dcterms:description: This dataset includes various feedback control strategies for optimizing the performance of a Brownian ratchet, enhancing its sensitivity to weak external forces.
dcterms:title: Feedback Control Strategies

dcterms:creator: M. Feito
F. J. Cao
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the time-delayed feedback control of a flashing ratchet, exploring how delays in feedback can affect the system's performance.
dcterms:title: Time-Delayed Feedback Control

dcterms:creator: F. Roca
J. P. G. Villaluenga
L. Dinis
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an optimal protocol for a collective flashing ratchet, providing insights into the best strategies for maximizing particle transport.
dcterms:title: Optimal Protocol for a Collective Flashing Ratchet

dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
F. Wolski
P. Dhariwal
A. Radford
O. Klimov
dcterms:description: This dataset includes the Proximal Policy Optimization algorithm, a popular method in reinforcement learning for optimizing policies in various environments.
dcterms:title: Proximal Policy Optimization Algorithm

dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
P. Moritz
S. Levine
M. Jordan
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: This dataset provides the Generalized Advantage Estimation method, which is used to improve the efficiency of reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Generalized Advantage Estimation

dcterms:creator: A. Paszke
S. Gross
F. Massa
L. Yang
Z. L. DeVito
Z. Lin
A. G. Desmaison
Y. Antiga
A. Lerer
dcterms:description: This dataset includes the PyTorch implementation, a high-performance deep learning library that provides tools for building and training neural networks.
dcterms:title: PyTorch Implementation

dcterms:creator: D. P. Kingma
J. Ba
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the Adam optimization method, which is widely used for training deep learning models due to its efficiency and effectiveness.
dcterms:title: Adam Optimization Method
